Managing director @Inflexia Webmarketing professor (Limoges University - France)

On the Web since 1996, 34 years old, Kevin follows the evolution of the web and the emergence of new uses, resulting in new behaviors both side users that marketing side. After his first experiences at IBM Global Services, he has worked since 1999 in PageFrance and Spray / Caramail as online project manager. It then creates Edelys, an interactive communications agency in 2001, he directed for two years before selling his shares. It then continues at Cisco Systems, All Telecom and at ARD Limousin, marketing functions and project management. Meanwhile, he founded Moonsize, visual marketing agency, which assigns activities to the agency for which vicinity he led the marketing activity. Kevin Gallot is also author of five technical guides (published by Dunod Editions) and teaches webmarketing and editorial marketing at the Limoges University since 2008.
